name: Harmoniq [Step 1]: Launch Transcription from Google Drive
description:
Use this template to start a transcription task and validate your Harmoniq setup before building full automations.

This lightweight scenario: – Sends a Google Drive video to Harmoniq for transcription
– Returns a task ID and confirmation
– Triggers your webhook to deliver the result in a second scenario

Perfect for debugging, testing output formats, and saving tokens before deploying complex flows.

⚙️ Requires: – Harmoniq connection
– Public Google Drive video link (edit access required)
– Language parameter (e.g., en, ru)
– Webhook module in your second scenario to catch the result

Learn more at https://www.kihedi.com
